person.persName: William Kendrick Long (Lamar County, Texas, resident and soldier.)

body.p: Lamar County, Texas, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Long and Marguerite Berry Long. Resident of Clinton County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Lamar County, Texas in 1860. Served in the 32nd Texas Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from February 17, 1862 to February 15, 1865. Captured at the Battle of Chickamauga, Georgia, on September 19, 1863. Prisoner of war at Camp Douglas, Illinois, from October 2, 1863 to February 15, 1865. Signed a loyalty oath to the Government of the United States on February 17, 1865.
